field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #FORUM_ID# - Forum ID #FORUM_NAME# - Forum name #TOPIC_ID# - Topic ID #MESSAGE_ID# - Message ID #TOPIC_TITLE# - Topic title #MESSAGE_TEXT# - Message text #MESSAGE_DATE# - Message date #AUTHOR# - Message author #RECIPIENT# - E-Mail recipient #TAPPROVED# - Message topic is approved #MAPPROVED# - Message is approved #PATH2FORUM# - Message Url #FROM_EMAIL# - E-Mail for From field of the EMail
